hotels.title: Luxe Queensland Hinterland Estate Retreat with Chef-Hatted Restaurant
hotels.description: The boutique hinterland Beechmont Estate retreat rests where the beauty of Lamington National Park meets a uniquely Australian country elegance. Just 50 minutes from the glittering Gold Coast, this gorgeous property allows you to lose yourself in the rolling hills of the Scenic Rim - put on your hiking boots to enjoy some of Australiaâ€™s best bushwalking trails, indulge in a picnic on the grounds of the estate, explore the property on bike or indulge at the day spa.
